title: WTF is an NFT? | Today, Explained in 10
description:
On Monday, a tweet sold for $2.9 million. That followed a JPEG that went for $69 million. The Verge’s Liz Lopatto explains how internet ephemera turned to gold.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: WTF is an NFT? | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: From the art world to the NBA, lots of people are cashing in on a craze for unique digital assets known as NFTs
